text: IONIS Education Group is the leadingIONIS Group Education s'engage dans le soutien scolaire à domicile private higher education group in France. The group was created in 1980Ionis Education Group lance une école sur les métiers de l'Internet and has more than 35,000 students and 100,000 alumni in 2023 currently working in business, IT, aviation, energy, transportation, biology, management, finance, marketing, communication, and design.A Bordeaux, les nouveaux locaux de Ionis Education Group préfigurent le campus de demain 29 schools are members of the group. It also has an independent non-profit Foundation. Since July 2023, the head is Charline Avenel. == Member schools == === Business === * Institut supérieur de gestion * ISG Luxury Management * ISG RH * ISG Sport Business Management * Institut supérieur européen de gestion group * ICS Bégué * Institut supérieur européen de formation par l'action * MOD'SPE Paris * XP, the international esport & gaming school === Technology === * Concours Advance * École pour l'informatique et les techniques avancées * École pour l'informatique et les nouvelles technologies * École spéciale de mécanique et électricité * IA Institut * Institut polytechnique des sciences avancées * Institut sup'biotech de Paris * E-Artsup * Epitech Digital * Epitech Executive * IONIS School of Technology and Management * Coding Academy * SecureSphere by EPITA * Supinfo * Web@cademie === Education solutions === * École des technologies numériques appliquées * Fondation IONIS * IONIS 361 * IONISx * PHG Academy == References == == Other websites == * IONIS Education Group website * IONIS Online Category:Colleges and universities in France Category:1980 establishments in France
title: IONIS Education Group
